mapper.select: SELECT ssg.id, ssg.subjectId FROM student_subject_grade ssg WHERE ssg.id=#{userNumber};

SELECT student_subject_grade.*, subject.name subjectName FROM student_subject_grade JOIN subject ON student_subject_grade.subjectid = subject.id where student_subject_grade.id = '201232001' and student_subject_grade.completeType = '전공필수';

SELECT student_subject_grade.*, subject.name subjectName FROM student_subject_grade JOIN subject ON student_subject_grade.subjectid = subject.id where student_subject_grade.id = #{id} and student_subject_grade.completeType = '전공필수';
SELECT ssg.*, s.name subjectName, s.subjectScore subjectScore FROM student_subject_grade ssg JOIN subject s ON ssg.subjectid = s.id where ssg.id = #{id} and ssg.completeType = '교양필수';
